findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables that are initialized once in the constructor and are not modified afterwards should be declared as immutable to save gas.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and can also increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper checks, which can lead to problems when the contract is executed.
